response.overview: When high school best friends Morgan, Sydney, and Kate find out they’ve all been accepted to the same college, they plan one last carefree vacation to celebrate. But their perfect getaway takes a turn when they realize their high school rivals are vacationing at the same resort—and their parents have somehow gotten the idea that the girls are dating those very enemies. Now, the rivals must team up and fake being perfect couples to keep up appearances.
response.tagline: Keeping up appearances never looked this complicated
response.title: Fake It Till Summer Ends
